body:
Comment 10: 
Maximilian,

Perhaps I am mistaken, but I think we have done everything we are planning to do here.
See (syscall.Errno)Error
http://code.google.com/p/go/source/browse/src/pkg/syscall/syscall_windows.go#76. It will
print "English" error message first; if fails, it will print "native" error message
second; if that fails, it will print "winapi error #9999" third and last. Do you have a
problem with that approach?

Perhaps the code I am referring to is not on "release" branch, but it is definitely on
"tip".

Alex
